page.title: 07Penrose
page.content: "Much the same thing happened to my husband when he was a boy of 15 or 16,while Kathryn,my elder daughter, also sensed a man bending over her. She was not able to move,and for some time after that,slept with the light on. " There is strong evidence that the bones of a boy were,in fact,found under an apple tree in the orchard and taken for interment in Sennen Churchyard.The orchard has now gone, the last tree having been blown down in a gale last year. On one of our school Domesday Outings we came across a small field within sight of Penrose Farm.It is very over grown and in the middle of it we found a very old apple tree.....
